TEXT.BODY: Shr 40 cts vs 75 cts Qtly div 15-1/2 cts vs 15-1/2 cts prior Net 11.7 mln vs 21.4 mln Revs 447.5 mln vs 445.2 mln Nine mths Shr 1.04 dlrs vs 1.99 dlrs Net 29.9 mln vs 56.8 mln Revs 1.30 billion vs 1.28 billion NOTE: Full name is Yellow Freight System Inc.
